page.title: 05RIVER FROME & POMEROY WOODS
page.content: At the end of{POMEROY LANE}is the {River Frome.}It's a lovely safe place to go paddling or fishing on a warm afternoon . We usually cycle. It's a clear shallow river that moves quickly over the pebbly bottom. People fly fish and it is private. If you go up the river furtherthere is an old water wheel. It goes round very slowly. You can also canoe. In {POMEROY WOODS}people go shooting. They shoot specially reared pheasants besides rabbits and foxes. If you're lucky you may see a deer. There are also grey squirrels and woodpeckers. The ground is hard in Summer but boggy in Winter. There are lots of oaks, firs,horse chestnuts , ash and a few elm. So in Autumn you have a lot of leaves under your feet. You can walk through the wood because there is a public footpath.
